publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-834 Angus MacKay: The Census (Scotland) Amendment Order 2000-That the Justice and Home Affairs Committee recommends that the draft Census (Scotland) Amendment Order 2000, to the extent that it relates to the particulars printed in italics in article 2 (3), be approved.

S1M-834 Angus MacKay: The Census (Scotland) Amendment Order 2000-That the Justice and Home Affairs Committee recommends that the draft Census (Scotland) Amendment Order 2000, to the extent that it relates to the particulars printed in italics in article 2 (3), be approved.
